department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of new outdoor training equipment
description: Purchase new outdoor training equipment to ensure operational fitness and safety during training.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice for Outdoor Fitness Equipment

#### Title
W0133-23T008_B - Outdoor Fitness Equipment

#### Reference Number
WS3696028199-Doc3921176592


#### Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: March 28, 2023
* **TenderClosing Date and Time**: April 26, 2023 02:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: The tender is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, among others.


#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking the acquisition of new outdoor training equipment to ensure the operational fitness and safety of members while training.

**Deliverability:** The equipment will be delivered to the Department of National Defence at 19 Wing Comox, Building 101, Lazo, British Columbia V0R 2K0.


#### Selection Criteria

* The purchase of the equipment will be made through a competitive bidding process with the lowest price being the selection criteria.


#### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 29, 2024
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contact Information

Bill Reusch (SPAC/PSPC)
bille.reusch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
